mapper.select: select * from hall where user_id = #{user_id} and visibility = 'Y'

select h.hall_id, h.hall_name, h.address1, h.address2, rd.start_date, rd.end_date, rd.start_time, rd.end_time, u.name, r.reserve_id from hall h join reservation r on h.hall_id = r.hall_id join reserve_date rd on r.reserve_id = rd.reserve_id join user u on r.user_id = u.user_id where r.reserve_status = 'Y' and h.user_id = #{user_id};
